metadata.title: CVE-2022-25147 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in apr_base64 functions ofApache Portable Runtime Utility (APR-util) allows an attacker to writebeyond bounds of a buffer. This issue affects Apache Portable RuntimeUtility (APR-util) 1.6.1 and prior versions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-25147` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libaprutil1 - 1.5.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
libaprutil1-dbd-mysql - 1.5.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
libaprutil1-dbd-odbc - 1.5.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
libaprutil1-dbd-pgsql - 1.5.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
libaprutil1-dbd-sqlite3 - 1.5.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
libaprutil1-ldap - 1.5.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: apr-util package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.4-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
